channel.title: How do I move the start position?
channel.description:
Well I dunno how to move te person from there starting position to a new one... Like say when you log on you'd be in ape atoll, how would you switch that to be in edge, varroc, ect... I just need to know wat to search in the client.Java?
~J o h n
I appriciate any help in this...

item.title: How do I move the start position?
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.source: How do I move the start position?

item.title: How do I move the start position?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

  1. go to player file
  2. open it
  3. search for : teleportToX =
  4. it normal stand under this :
/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/

		pHead=7;
		pTorso=25;
		pArms=29;
		pHands=35;
		pLegs=39;
		pFeet=44;
		pBeard=14;

		/*pHead=3;
		pTorso=25;
		pArms=26;
		pHands=34;
		pLegs=36;
		pFeet=42;
		pBeard=0;*/
  1. so you change X end Y coords
  2. compile
  3. new start positon :)[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 04:57:04 AM[/size][hr]this is a larger spot of the Codes sow you could see it faster if your on the right spot

[code] //Giving the player a unique look
playerEquipment[playerHat]=2613;
playerEquipment[playerCape]=6570;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
playerEquipment[playerChest]=2607;
playerEquipment[playerShield]=2611;
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2609;
playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837;
playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4587;

/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/

	pHead=7;
	pTorso=25;
	pArms=29;
	pHands=35;
	pLegs=39;
	pFeet=44;
	pBeard=14;

	/*pHead=3;
	pTorso=25;
	pArms=26;
	pHands=34;
	pLegs=36;
	pFeet=42;
	pBeard=0;*/
      
	// initial x and y coordinates of the player
	heightLevel = 0;
	// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
	teleportToX = 3492;//Player start point, Now in canifis.
	teleportToY = 3491;//Player start point[/code]

Read full topic
